alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 26 at 11:23AM MST until July 26 at 2:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Areas near Wilhoit along State Route 89 in Yavapai County in west central Arizona... * Until 230 PM MST. * At 1121 AM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 0.5 and 1.25 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Wilhoit. This includes the following highways... State Route 89 between mile markers 290 and 298. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Board Creek, Sheppard Wash, Copper Basin Wash, Finch Wash, Hassayampa River, Kirkland Creek, Orofino Wash and Skull Valley Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
